name: R4-search-param-type-for-R2
title: Cross-version VS for R4.SearchParamType for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/search-param-type|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R2. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R4 to R2.
